about_the_game:
This game basically is a schmup with a retro vibe in it and some funny additions. The story takes place in Kaboom, a once peaceful land which now is under attack by the evil forces of the Machinedrillers led by the Supreme Commander. So, you are Sage1, the best pilot of the Air Force of Kaboom and you fight all alone the evil forces emerging into his land, with combat taking place from the skies, through forests and even the outer space!!! Brace yourself for an adventure you'll never forget!!!

The main features of this game are intense aerial combat enriched with a survival style, a variety of enemies and enormous, challenging bosses and also, the player has power ups like orbitals, point coins and hearts for extra lives.

All music and SFX in the game are licensed and used legally.

This game can be played only with a keyboard and mouse.

In the future, gamepad compatibility will be added and more complex menus.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 First Generation or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 750I
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card 2010 or newer
  • VR Support: No

short_description: A fantasy and funny schmup game, with a retro arcade vibe within. The player controls a fighter jet plane which shoots unlimited laser pellets and limited nuke ammo, which deals massive damage to enemies and bosses. It has four different difficulty levels, for all ages.
